intro: Palicourea stenoclada, commonly known as the narrow-leafed palicourea, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its flowers are typically white or pale green, clustered in dense inflorescences. Palicourea stenoclada is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and undergrowth.
